name: .CERBER
summary: Learn about .CERBER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can use the Trend Micro Ransomware File Decryptor for decrypting CERBER files. However, it is important that you remove the Cerber virus before decrypting the files. You can remove the virus manually or by using antivirus software. Also, if you have a backup of your files you can execute a full system restore.
